{{cpp/experimental/function/title|swap}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions/pmr/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=libfund_ts|
void swap( function&amp; other );
}}

Exchanges the stored callable objects of {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}}.

The allocators of {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} are not exchanged.

{{rrev multi
|since1=libfund_ts|rev1=
The behavior is undefined if {{c|1=*this-&gt;get_memory_resource() != *other.get_memory_resource()}}.
|since2=libfund_ts_3|rev2=
The behavior is undefined if {{c|1=this-&gt;get_allocator() != other.get_allocator()}}.
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|function wrapper to exchange the stored callable object with}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
